# rtx_routes (Data Source)

Use this data source to get routing table information from an RTX router.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Internal identifier for this data source.
- `routes` (List of Object) List of routes in the RTX router's routing table. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--routes))

<a id="nestedatt--routes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `routes`

Read-Only:

- `destination` (String)
- `gateway` (String)
- `interface` (String)
- `metric` (Number)
- `protocol` (String)
